website_summaries.verdict: Designed specifically for handling the roughest of terrain, while delivering the smoothest ride possible, the Cyrusher is a premium folding mountain bike for dedicated backwoods cyclists.
pros: Quick-release clamp easily folds bike in half
cons: This high-end folding mountain bike is a fairly expensive model
It is only available in black

customer_reviews.title: Magnesium wheels are defective
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three Cyrusher FR100 bicycles recently. Upon the first ride, all three stripped out the threads between the cassette and the rear wheel. All three bikes are completely inoperable. The magnesium mag wheels are defective as magnesium is too soft to transmit the necessary torque.
customer_reviews.author: Niki S.

customer_reviews.title: This is very good quality mointain bike and model looking
customer_reviews.text: This is very good quality mointain bike and model looking. I have a little bit issue with brake pad noise touch to the front disc, but customer service showed me how to adjust it very quickly. So far so good now, i'm very enjoy when ride on it. Also, i did attach kid trailer seat and it's work perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Thuan N.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Cyrusher
customer_reviews.text: From start of ordering to receiving my Cyrusher 2 days later i was very impressed. I've never ordered something like this without many reviews to see. I have no regrets. I love my Cyrusher. I drive a semi and the bike is perfect for taking on the road. The bike is high quality and is easy to get out of my semi. I'd recommend to anyone who has little storage room but still wants a quality bike not to hesitate to order a Cyrusher. 😀👍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you save shipping box
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for hitting the trails, folding is simple and easy, however i did receive this bike without all parts as pieces were missing, amazon backed me up though, a few screws that cost me out of pocket, but best bike i own, i own several high quality bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzaman

customer_reviews.title: Great for limited space and handles rough trails like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great folding bike! I've had it for 4 years now and it hasn't disappointed. I've taken it on rough trails and jumps, expecting it to fail, but it just keeps running like a champ. The seat is a bit uncomfortable, but that's an easy swap. I also changed out the wheels for something not as heavy. If you have a car with limited space, it'll be perfect for you. I can fit this in a Corvette, so if you can't install a bike rack on your car, no need to worry. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan and Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Rides smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money, nice components, folds easily. Im 5'3" 125 lbs and purchased a 16" frame. I can carry unfolded bike up my stairs.
customer_reviews.author: LuxuryPrincess

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike, Its beautiful strong and very durable. Not only am i happy with the bike but the company's customer service is so attentive and friendly. They were so patient with me i asked many questions about the bike and they answered quite quickly. The bike turns heads and really out performs others. Looks better in person. I'm extremely happy, you will be too, customer service is amazing and that made me love the bike even more. I'm considering the electric one soon too, looks amazing! I never review but this bike and service deserve it!
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for me
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for me, I’m 6” and have lots of space between the handle and my knees, did a little adjustments to the gears and will replace the seat as I don’t have too much cushion back there. Didn’t have set up instructions in the box but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Less is more
customer_reviews.text: Way too heavy, too many gadgets gears, and frame make it a non desirable items after few rides
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: looks good, minor assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick, as advertised, looks good, minor assembly required, only 20 miles in it so far but I like the ride especially with front fork shock option to lock or unlock. Some reviews said seatpost was short, I received 200mm length post which works for me at 5'11" x 210 lbs. Only complaint is a bit more than I wanted to spend but still not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W Shylanski

customer_reviews.title: ... stolen after 3 days so i guess other people liked it as much as i did
customer_reviews.text: It got stolen after 3 days so i guess other people liked it as much as i did. I recommend locking it around the frame and wheel instead of just the rear wheel :) Beautiful bike and easy to assemble. Can't speak for everyone but I recommend buying a more comfortable saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bike I ever purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a number of bikes over the years, but never been as satisfied as I am with this bike. Looks, feels and rides great. Even though initially the bike received was slightly defective (front wheel would not stay inflated), once I contacted Cyrusher, they did not just send me a new front wheel, they shipped me a whole new bike and paid the cost to ship defective bike back! Now that's customer service! So if you are looking for a good bike with even better customer service, no need to look no further...
customer_reviews.author: DLV

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not for sneaking around.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone flips out over this bike... If you are trying to inconspicuously go to the store, or anywhere in public, for that matter, plan on some extra time to converse with the masses. No one has ever seen a bike like this in central Florida. Where did you get it? How much did it cost? Wow it's got disc brakes. How much does it weigh? If you like lots of attention , get one.
customer_reviews.author: 600ydsplus

customer_reviews.title: assembled with awesome parts. I'm completely happy
customer_reviews.text: This bike performs the way it should, assembled with awesome parts. I'm completely happy. And their customer service team is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mychal Smith

customer_reviews.title: Instructions for assembly wasn't in the box. Instructions were ...
customer_reviews.text: Instructions for assembly wasn't in the box. Instructions were emailed to me a day after receiving the bike. Not the level of quality I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If LOOKING FOR MOUNTAIN  BIKE THIS ONE IS NICE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good Price ,Cool And Nice Folding Mens Mountain Bike Bicycle .
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent very comfortable and practiced one of the best bike. very good material
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This bike is super heavy not worth the money be better off buying a Cannondale
customer_reviews.author: Eric chamdler

customer_reviews.title: Light and strong
customer_reviews.text: It is a great looking bike and rides very well.
customer_reviews.author: VICENTE G AGUILAR TAMAYO

product_meta.title: Cyrusher FR100 Folding Mountain Bike Full Suspension 24 Speeds Shimano Shifter with Aluminium Frame Disc Brake and Suspension Fork for Men
feature_bullets: Premium Quality : With lightweight and strong aluminum alloy 17 inch Frame,26 inch wheel and the high quality Suspension Fork packed with comfort shock absorption, which can bring a smooth cruising and easy riding.

Great Braking System: With front and rear disc brakes and 24-speed shimono shifting system, you can choose any speed with perfect brakes and excellent full suspension riding in mud, creeks, sand, road with ease.

Adjustable & Foldable: It is fitted with a Quick-Release Clamp to assist in folding the bike quickly, it is easy to fold and stow in a corner of your apartment or in your car trunk taking it with you anywhere.
Unique Tire: Fat Tires that can easily take on the different types of off road terrains. It comes with 24-speeds that can handle hilly terrains and the gear change is awesome and smooth.
Enhanced Safety And Control: The front and rear disc brakes and help keep the cyclist safe even in high speeds and down sloppy terrains. You will also have more control on when and where to stop.
